text: Byker Grove is a British television show which aired from 1989 to 2006. It was created by writer Adele Rose and producer Andrea Wonfor. The show came on at 5:10pm after Newsround but it later moved to 5pm on CBBC on BBC One. The show was for older teenagers and young adults. The show sometimes had serious and controversial stories. == Other websites == * Geograph Page - The Mitre, Benwell * * Byker Grove episode guide * Byker Grove cast list * Category:1989 television series debuts Category:2006 British television series endings Category:1980s British television series Category:1990s children's television series Category:2000s children's television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British LGBT television programmes Category:British children's television series Category:British teen drama television series Category:English-language television programs Category:1980s children's television series
title: Byker Grove
